name: Villoft Zen Living Resort
description: Located in Thalang, 6.2 km from Wat Prathong, Villoft Zen Living Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sun terrace and to a hot tub. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave, a stovetop and a toaster. At Villoft Zen Living Resort each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 7.4 km from the accommodation, while Two Heroines Monument is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 15 km from Villoft Zen Living Resort.

name: The Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket
description: Five-star luxury awaits in Phuket, Thailand at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket. Overlooking Siray Bay near Phuket Town, our luxurious Phuket beach resort provides an ideal locale for quiet getaways, romantic holidays and corporate retreats. Find us moments from pristine white-sand beaches and local watersports. Take advantage of our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, three outdoor pools, the Westin® Kids Club and Heavenly Spa by Westin™. Sample tantalizing cuisine and refreshing beverages at our six Phuket resort restaurants and bars, many of which boast water views. If you are planning an event in Phuket, choose one of our elegant indoor or outdoor venues. Enjoy room amenities like Heavenly® Beds, rainforest showers, spacious desks, free Wi-Fi and LCD televisions. Admire panoramic sea views or relax on a furnished balcony. Select suites and resort villas include plunge pools and generous entertaining spaces. Find your sanctuary on the beach at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, PhuketMarriott

name: Amari Phuket
description: A stone’s throw from Patong Beach, the luxurious Amari Phuket enjoys spectacular views of the Andaman Sea from its private beach. It boasts 2 outdoor pools, a first-class spa and 2 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas. Located in southern Phuket, 1.5 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Mall, Amari Phuket provides free shuttle services to Kata Beach. It is a 55-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Bright and airy, rooms come with private balconies and beautiful views. Amenities include a satellite TV, DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Breeze Spa features a wide range of beauty treatments. Relaxing massages and therapies can be enjoyed from sea-facing pavilions. The hotel also provides an outdoor spa pool and a fitness centre. La Gritta serves Italian dishes featuring gourmet pizzas, fresh pasta, delectable desserts along with an extensive wine list. Seaside international dining is available at Rim Talay and the spectacular Jetty Restaurant. Drinks and quick bites are served at both the Rim Talay Pool and Samutr Bars.

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: The Pace Phuket Boutique Resort
address: 88/17 M.7 Soi Saiyuan, Wiset Road, Rawai 83130
description: A full-service spa, an outdoor pool, and 10 beach bars are available at this hotel. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Other amenities include a bar/lounge, a swim-up bar, and spa services. Weekly housekeeping is available.Expedia

name: Thames Tara Pool Villa Rawai Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 71/112 หมู่ 4 ตำบล ราไวย์ อำเภอเมืองภูเก็ต, Rawai 83130
description: Set in Rawai Beach, 1.9 km from Chalong Beach, Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 2.4 km from Chalong Pier and 5 km from Chalong Temple, the property provides a shared lounge and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus all rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or Asian options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Chinpracha House is 11 km from Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus, while Thai Hua Museum is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Golden Paradise Hotel
description: Situated in Karon Beach, 1.3 km from Karon Beach, Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS the rooms include bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Kata Beach is 2.5 km from Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS, while Phuket Simon Cabaret is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 43 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunwing Kamala Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Providing a shuttle service to Phuket International Airport, as well as free Wi-Fi, Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is a comfortable place to stay in Kamala. It also provides water slides, a kids club and a swimming pool. The resort offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and a playground. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchenette, a refrigerator and a private balcony. All provide a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. Guests of Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ are welcome to experience European, Asian and Thai cuisine at Som's Kitchen, or try Thai, Asian and European meals at Fino. Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is close to Kamala's well-known attractions, with the Phuket FantaSea only moments on foot from the property. Guests can also visit Kamala Beach.Revato

name: Pacific Club Resort
description: Perched upon a hilltop and only a 10-minute walk from Karon Beach, the uniquely-designed boutique Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spectacular views and spacious accommodation with private balcony. Free WiFi is accessible in the entire premises. Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus is a 10-minute drive to Patong Beach and a 5-minute drive to Kata Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 1-hr drive away. Featuring Tuscan Travertine bathrooms made with real travertine and granite, all rooms come with air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. The property has an electronic locking system for guests' safety. Select rooms have well-equipped kitchenettes and private living and dining areas. The swimming pool at Pacific Club Karon Beach Resort offers a 360-degree view of Karon Beach. Guests can relax in the spa bath and enjoy massages and body treatments at the spa. The hotel also provides a well-equipped gym. The Dining Room restaurant offers an international menu for the convenience of guests.The delectable cuisine can be served anywhere in the resort.

name: The Naka Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified is a 10-minute ride from the white sands of Patong Beach and various entertainment options. Offering unique-designed villas with private balconies, the property also boasts an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Phuket Town is approximately a 20-minute drive from The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified. A 40-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. Stylish villas are tastefully decorated and offer modern facilities such as a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety box. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests of The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified can laze by the pool or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and meeting facilities. For meals, sample a variety of both Thai and international cuisines served at The Wiwa, an all-day dining restaurant located just 5 steps away from the beach. With particular views of the sea and the sunset, The Nana offers refreshing beverages until late night. The Meka provides guests with a wide range of healthy dishes and drinks.

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Paresa Resort Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Treating guests to a superb infinity pool overlooking the sea, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and features a plunge pool. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests of the resort can start their day at The Spa by Paresa, or enjoy the various leisure facilities, including fitness classes. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for those guests wishing to stay online while travelling. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has a private balcony, a marble bathroom and direct pool access. They all have a pillow menu, an in-room dining area and a private terrace. Large windows provide panoramic views over the sea. Serving local cuisine, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s restaurant offers a romantic setting for a satisfying meal. Room service is also available during certain times. Phuket International Airport is less than a 45-minute drive from the resort. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Kamala.Revato

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: Sai Rougn Residence - Sha Extra Plus
description: Stop at Sai Rougn Residence to discover the wonders of Phuket. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, grocery deliveries, daily housekeeping, 24-hour security, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. Sai Rougn Residence combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Phuket unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Grand Mercure Phuket Patong (Sha Plus+)
description: Set back 500 metres from Patong Beach, Grand Mercure Phuket Patong Resort & Villas offers a quiet and secluded sanctuary just steps away from one of the most famous beachfront entertainment districts in Thailand. Shopping bazaars, a range of international eateries and many of Phuket's most exciting nightlife venues are all within walking distance. Excursions to outlying islands and incredible diving and snorkelling sites are easily arranged from Patong.accorhotels.com

name: Modern Living Hotel
description: Situated by Patong Beach, Modern Living Hotel boasts an accommodation in the heart of Pa Tong. Guests enjoy seafood dishes at an on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Offering ample storage space, the air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a cable TV that comes with international channels. Some rooms provide views of the sea, a spa tub or a pool access. Bathrobes, slippers, a hairdryer and a hot shower are all available in the private bathrooms. The front desk is available 24-hours everyday. Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center are about 1 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from the property. Airport pick-up services are also available for a surcharge.

name: Momento Bangtao Beach
address: 69/38 Bangtao Beach, Chengtalay, Talang, Phuket, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Set within a few steps of Bang Tao Beach and 1.4 km of Pineapple Beach in Bang Tao Beach, Momento Bangtao Beach offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or American breakfast. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Momento Bangtao Beach. Pansea Beach is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Two Heroines Monument is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 21 km from Momento Bangtao Beach, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: The Chava Resort
description: The Chava Resort is a 2-minute walk from Phuket’s Surin Beach. It offers 5-star service apartments with full kitchen facilities, a dining area and free WiFi. An outdoor pool and restaurant are available. The resort is a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surin Plaza Shopping Mall is a short walk away. Convenience stores can be found within a 2-minute walk. The spacious apartments at The Chava Resort feature modern décor and private balconies. The lounge area is equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and a iPod dock. Bathtubs are included in the private bathroom. Guests can lounge by the 35-metre swimming pool or book a day trip at the tour desk. Chava also provides laundry services and currency exchange. The Chava Bar & Restaurant overlooks the pool and serves authentic Thai dishes, Western delights and refreshing cocktails. Reservations at nearby restaurants can also be arranged at the front desk from 06.00-23.00 hours.

name: Sunset Beach Resort
description: Featuring a spa with massage services and an outdoor spa pool, Sunset Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified provides a quiet getaway along Patong Beach. The resort offers 1 restaurant and 3 bars. Resort Sunset Beach provides a free shuttle service to Patong Town, 2.5 km away. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Spacious rooms at Sunset Resort offer balconies with outdoor seating areas. A TV with cable channels and tea/coffee makers are provided. Guests can work out in the well-equipped fitness centre. Sightseeing arrangements and car rental services are available at the tour desk while a business centre takes care of guests’ communication needs. Sea & Sun Restaurant offers traditional Thai and European cuisine. The restaurant also serves an American buffet breakfast daily. The Rock Bar serves light snacks and beverages and offers views of the pool. Guests can also enjoy the drinks at the pool bar.

name: The Cove
description: Located along Ao Yon Bay, near Cape Panwa, The Cove offers comfortable accommodation with sea views. Free WiFi is available. Bungalows and villas feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a full minibar. There is also a safety deposit box, a seating area and a private bathroom with a shower. The Cove serves a healthy breakfast, along with Mediterranean and Australians cuisines. Cocktails and others drinks are also available. Phuket Town is a 15-minute drive from the property, while Central Festival Phuket is a 20-minute drive away. Phuket International Airport is located a 40 km drive from The Cove.

name: Byd Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach, BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus offers stylish serviced apartments surrounded by shopping and nightlife options. It features a rooftop pool and free WiFi in the entire property. BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus is within a 10-minute walk or a 2-minute Tuk Tuk drive of Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road. It is a 40-minute drive from the Phuket International Airport. Well-furnished modern apartments at BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus feature a separate living area with a 4K - 55-inch Smart TV and iPod docking station. Extras include home theater system and internet TV. For convenience, the European kitchen is equipped with cutlery, crockery and pans. An espresso coffee machine is also available in the room. Guests can relax with the massage treatments provided or take a dip in the outdoor rooftop swimming pool. A tour desk provides information on local attractions and car rental service. Enjoy hot meals at Restaurant Bistro and Bar@BYD Lofts. Alternatively, an extensive selection of wines, cold cuts and cheese are available at Wine Connection Deli Shop.

name: The Front Hotel and Apartments
description: Featuring an outdoor pool facing the ocean, The Front hotel and apartments is situated just across the street from a peaceful spot on Patong Beach. It offers modern sea-facing room and free Wi-Fi. The spacious air-conditioned rooms and apartments feature cement finishes, a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some rooms have a private balcony. They come with daily cleaning and bottled water. Steps from the Patong Beach beachfront, The Front Hotel and apartments is an easy stroll from the nearest minimart. It s a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy a relaxing poolside massage or explore Phuket with a day trip. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide concierge and childcare services. Light meals and refreshing cocktails are served at the pool bar. Room service is also available.

name: Kamala Beachfront Apartment
description: Located on Kamala Beach, a 5-minute walk from Phuket Fantasea, Kamala Beachfront Apartment offers well-appointed apartments. It boasts a saltwater pool with a hot tub and panorama views of the Andaman Sea. The Kamala Beachfront Apartment is a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport and 10 minutes from Kamala Village. It takes 30 minutes by car to Phuket Town. Apartments are luxurious with fine beddings and facilities like DVD players, air conditioning and an electronic safe. They all come with an open-concept living room with a dining area. They have well-equipped kitchens with microwave and a fridge. The hotel provides massage services, as well as, a tour desk for guests who wish to explore the area. Babysitting services are provided for convenience. Prime Kitchen is the hotel’s beachfront restaurant, which serves traditional Thai food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ rooms.

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: Grand Orlov
description: Situated in Patong Beach, a few steps from Patong Beach, Grand Orlov features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Grand Orlov provides some units with mountain views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Grand Orlov include Kalim Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.
